scripts.fix:ssh443: bash -lc 'mkdir -p ~/.ssh && printf "%s\n" "Host github.com" "  Hostname ssh.github.com" "  Port 443" "  User git" "  ServerAliveInterval 60" > ~/.ssh/config && chmod 600 ~/.ssh/config && ssh -T git@github.com || true'
scripts.setup:github: bash -lc 'USER_NAME="Steven Cao"; USER_EMAIL="stevencao2015@gmail.com"; BRANCH=main; REPO_URL="git@github.com:stevencao2020/gaowei-assistant.git"; git config --global user.name "$USER_NAME"; git config --global user.email "$USER_EMAIL"; if [ ! -d .git ]; then git init; fi; git remote remove origin 2>/dev/null || true; git remote add origin "$REPO_URL"; git branch -M "$BRANCH"; git add .; git commit -m "Initial commit" || true; git push -u origin "$BRANCH";'
scripts.pub: bash -lc 'MSG=${npm_config_m:-chore: update}; BR=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git add -A && git commit -m "$MSG" || true; git pull --rebase origin "$BR" || true; git push -u origin "$BR"'
scripts.pull: bash -lc 'BR=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git pull --rebase origin "$BR"'
scripts.ver:patch: bash -lc 'npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags'
scripts.ver:minor: bash -lc 'npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags'
scripts.ver:major: bash -lc 'npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags'
scripts.tag: bash -lc 'V=${npm_config_v:-$(date +%Y.%m.%d-%H%M)}; git tag -a "v$V" -m "release: v$V"; git push origin "v$V"'
scripts.pub:tag: bash -lc 'MSG=${npm_config_m:-chore: update}; BR=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD); git add -A && git commit -m "$MSG" || true; git pull --rebase origin "$BR" || true; git push -u origin "$BR"; npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s"; git push origin "$BR" --tags'
